DataElement.preferredName: Disease or Disorder Curative Therapeutic Procedure Or Extend Life Expectancy Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A coded response to questions which are necessary to allow a person to participate in a clinical trial related to treatments of any abnormal condition of the body or mind that tend to restore health or are expected to increase the duration of life.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Disease or Disorder Cure Therapeutic Procedure Or Extend Life Expectancy Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function._Serving or tending to restore health; a remedy._An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._To increase in length or duration._The organic phenomenon that distinguishes living organisms from nonliving ones; showing characteristics of life._Something expected, especially the value (e.g. an amount, or length of time) or probability of occurrence for a specific event based on statistical calculations._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A disease is any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. Sometimes the term is used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function. (from Wikipedia)

Concepts.definition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.

ObjectClass.changeDescription: Updated to add EVS concept preferred name. dw

Property.preferredName: Cure Therapeutic Procedure Or Extend Life Expectancy Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: Serving or tending to restore health; a remedy.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.:An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.:To increase in length or duration.:The organic phenomenon that distinguishes living organisms from nonliving ones; showing characteristics of life.:Something expected, especially the value (e.g. an amount, or length of time) or probability of occurrence for a specific event based on statistical calculations.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: Serving or tending to restore health; a remedy.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
To increase in length or duration.
Showing characteristics of life; displaying signs of life.
Something expected, especially the value (e.g. an amount, or length of time) or probability of occurrence for a specific event based on statistical calculations.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator to represent a response of Yes, No, or Not Applicable._The affirmative response to a question or activity._The non-affirmative response to a question._Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context._A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: PQT
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is there known standard therapy for the patient's disease that is potentially curative or definitely capable of extending life expectancy?

DataElement.administrativeNotes: 7/19/2022: fixed the box symbol in PQT.wz
